Description: Powered by Frooition Pro Shop Search 2003 Gibson Les Paul Standard Double Cut Plus Charcoal Flame w/Gibson Case USA Click here to view full size. Full Size ImageClick to close full size. Item Description 2003 Gibson Les Paul Standard Double Cut Plus electric guitar in good condition with a some dents and dings on the front with some chipping in sections of the top edge. The back also has a some of dents and dings of different sizes and severity. Nice transparent Charcoal finish on the beautiful AAA flame maple top with gold hardware and gold knobs. The gold hardware is worn through around the edges. The guitar has a nice action and the '60's profile mahogany neck with a bound fretboard and trapezoid inlays has a great feel. The frets are in very good condition with little to no playwear. The Gibson 490R/498T pickups have a nice tone with good output that sound great into a clean or overdriven amp. The guitar is equipped with a tune-o-matic style bridge, stop bar tailpiece and Grover tuners. Don't let the cosmetic issues of this instrument deter you. This is a great sounding, playing and still pretty good looking guitar with a full lifetime left in it. Includes the Gibson hard shell case. Made in the USA. Serial Number: 01853346 Weight: 7 lbs. 15 oz.
